CustomField.formula:
IF( (LimitsHeapSizeUsed__c / LimitsHeapSizeMax__c * 100) >= 90, "⛔", IF( (LimitsHeapSizeUsed__c / LimitsHeapSizeMax__c * 100) < 90 && (LimitsHeapSizeUsed__c / LimitsHeapSizeMax__c * 100) >= 80, "⚠️", "✅" ) ) + ' ' +
TEXT(LimitsHeapSizeUsed__c) + ' / ' + TEXT(LimitsHeapSizeMax__c) + ' (' + TEXT(ROUND(LimitsHeapSizeUsed__c / LimitsHeapSizeMax__c * 100, 2)) + '%)'
CustomField.label: Heap Size
